DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effectiveness 3 behavioral weight loss programs- Weight Watchers , university-based behavioral weight loss treatment , combine approach include university-based treatment follow Weight Watchers .
DOC.brief_title: Managing Obesity Combining Behavioral Weight Loss Commercial Approaches
DOC.criteria: Age 3065 year BMI 2750 kg/m2 Written approval/consent primary health care provider Unable walk 2 block without stop . Currently participate weight loss program take weight loss medication . Participated weight loss program last year Took weight loss medication last 6 month . Participated Weight Watchers last 2 year . Lost > =5 % body weight 6 month prior screen . Pregnant , lactate , less 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant study time frame . Report condition judgment principal investigator would render potentially unlikely follow protocol 12 month study . Report medical condition would affect safety and/or efficacy weight management program involve change diet physical activity .
